title: New Jobs Report Is A Bounceback From Disappointing August
teaser: The U.S. jobless rate dropped below 6 percent in September, the lowest it's been since July 2008. And employers added 248,000 new jobs to their payrolls, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
